|vendor_id = 104c |device_id = ac50 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = "Wireless LAN", "11Mbps Mini PCI", "Version 01.02", "" |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = MXF-M900820,MXFM900820,MXF-M900614 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:90:4B
|chip1 = Harris;HFA3841;HFA3841CN, 0045K 4452540, LUC 1257H; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861B;HFA3861BIN, M0122A020; |chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A;HFA, 3683AIN, N0123EAAT; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Intersil;HFA3983;HFA, 3983IV, L0123HEFY;1;SiGe;28-lead EPTSSOP; ,,, I/Q Modulator/Demodulator and Synthesizer;Intersil;HFA3783;HFA3783IN, M0122A023;1;SiGe;48-lead LQFP; ,,, PCI CardBus Controller;Texas Instruments;PCI1410A;PCIbus, PCI1410A, AF 17A3LJJ;1; ,,, Parallel Flash memory (1 Mbit);SST;SST39VF010-90-4C-WH;SST 39VF010, 90-4C-WH, MPF 0108461-D;1; ,,, RAM chip (1 Mbit);TM Tech;T15N1024A;tm tech, 70P, CPT, T15N1024A 0114;2; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/10/2001 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device uses an HFA3861 MAC, connected to the host via a '''TI''' PCI1410 CardBus controller. It should work w/ '''hostap_cs''' / '''orinoco_cs'''.. but you will need PCMCIA support enabled / available. :The card's PCMCIA device ID is 028a:0002.
"WL-250F Rev.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
It appears to have been the wireless module for an '''EarthWalk''' eBuddy (P/N: 76-090004-00).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
